version_description:
Thanks for using the Shopkick app. We are constantly improving the app to make it better and faster. Tell us what you think of this latest update by visiting https://app.shopkick.com/help

Here is what we've changed in this release:
- Email Verification Flow -- Now users have the ability to change/update their email address in the app
- Today Tab -- Provides a quick glance of relevant kick-earning opportunities to users
- Challenges Widget -- Users can check out the weekly scan and receipt submission challenges to earn even more kicks

Betty dropped her phone in the ocean. Lucky for her she's got a backup phone to keep earning kicks. All she has to do is download Shopkick and log back into her account. To keep Betty's kicks safe we are now sending an email to confirm her old phone is swimming with the fishes. With this update, 2-factor authentication will be on all Shopkick accounts keeping potential password pirates at bay.

Are you crazy for kicks? Tell us how much you love the app by giving us a 5-star rating.

Have some concerns? Contact us. We want to hear from you. https://app.shopkick.com/help

In this sweltering summer heat, find refuge at the place we call the scanner's paradise, Best Buy. You'll find super strong air conditioning and now with this release, TONS of kicks for scanning!
Are you cuckoo for kicks? Tell us how much you love the app by giving us a 5-star rating.
Have some concerns? Contact us. We want to hear from you. https://app.shopkick.com/help

It’s back to school shopping season, and we’re here to help you earn tons of kicks to redeem towards those supplies. We’ve released new features and performance improvements to help make Shopkicking easier and more fun. Check it out!

Do we get an A+? Tell us how much you love the app by giving us a 5-star rating.

Got some feedback? Contact us. We want to hear from you. https://app.shopkick.com/help

Big news: now you can earn kicks for shopping from sites like eBay, Groupon, Jet, and more on your phone. WHAT!? We know, right?! This is huge. In this release there's a new selection of online stores for which you can get kicks. Plus, we’ve added new charities to our rewards selection. Check it out!

Has Shopkick got you doing a happy dance? Tell us how much you love the app by giving us a 5-star rating.

Got some feedback? Contact us. We want to hear from you. https://app.shopkick.com/help

Good news for online shoppers! This update includes a bunch of great fixes to help you earn kicks for your purchases from online stores like eBay, Groupon, Boxed, Jet, Apple, and Spring.

Has Shopkick got you doing a happy dance? Tell how much you love the app and give us a 5-star rating.

Got some feedback? Contact us. We want to hear from you: https://app.shopkick.com/help

What’s more fun than shopping? Shopkick with friends! Invite your friends and you can both earn 250 kicks after they walk in or scan. Plus, now you can see the full list of people you've invited to earn free gift cards on Shopkick.

Has Shopkick got you doing a happy dance? Tell how much you love the app and give us a 5-star rating.

Got some feedback? Contact us. We want to hear from you: https://app.shopkick.com/help

Join the action at Best Buy! Now you can scan over 250+ offers from their weekly ad, and new offers drop every Sunday. That means you can earn THOUSANDS of kicks at Best Buy every week. What are you waiting for?

Has Shopkick got you doing a happy dance? Tell how much you love the app and give us a 5-star rating.

Got some feedback? Contact us. We want to hear from you: https://app.shopkick.com/help

Shopkick now offers many new stores where you can earn kicks on everyday purchases!  Earn kicks when you buy from the comfort of your couch at Walmart.com, eBay, Apple, Hotels.com, Groupon, Booking.com, Jet, Boxed and more through the Shopkick app.  Plus we’ve added new stores in the real world too - Ulta, Torrid, and Watch Station.   And, new gift card options are now available:  Amazon, Uber, eBay, Groupon, iTunes and crocs gift cards join other gift card favorites Starbucks, Target, Walmart, Sephora, Best Buy, TJ Maxx and more.  Earn free gift cards in time for the holidays!

Earn kicks when you buy from the comfort of your couch at Walmart.com, eBay, Apple, Hotels.com, Groupon, Booking.com, Jet, Boxed and more through the Shopkick app. Plus we’ve added new stores in the real world too - Ulta, Torrid, and Watch Station. And, new gift card options are now available:  Amazon, Uber, eBay, Groupon, iTunes and crocs gift cards join other gift card favorites Starbucks, Target, Walmart, Sephora, Best Buy, TJ Maxx and more.  Earn free gift cards in time for the holidays!

And, new gift card options are now available:  Amazon, Uber, eBay, Groupon, iTunes and crocs gift cards join other gift card favorites Starbucks, Target, Walmart, Sephora, Best Buy, TJ Maxx and more.  Earn free gift cards for your everyday shopping!

And, new gift card options are now available:  Amazon, Uber, eBay, Groupon, iTunes and crocs gift cards join other gift card favorites Starbucks, Target, Walmart, Sephora, Best Buy, TJ Maxx and more. And, new gift card options are now available:  Amazon, Uber, eBay, Groupon, iTunes and crocs gift cards join other gift card favorites Starbucks, Target, Walmart, Sephora, Best Buy, TJ Maxx and more.  Earn free gift cards for your everyday shopping!

What's new? Not much, fixing bugs and stuff. What's new with you? Oh wait, I forgot, we just added a reminder feature to the app. 
Have you ever gotten home after shopping and realized that you'd forgoten to open Shopkick to grab all those walk-in and scan kicks? Next time, set a reminder from the settings menu and the app will send a notification to your device when you get to the store. You'll never miss out on those kicks again.

We're working on some big improvements in the coming weeks, and we're excited to let you see them. 
Until then, we are doing some maintenance to make sure your Shopkick experience is always improving.

In this release we've fixed a number of issues, the most notable:
We've improved our support for the newest devices.
We fixed an issue which was preventing some users from getting Walk-ins.
(Don't worry, this wasn't the big update we've been hyping. That's the next release.)

This release, check the app to see if you’re in one of our sneak peek groups for two new features:
- A new Search bar, to help you quickly find online and nearby stores that offer kicks.
- A new Notification Center where you can find information about daily special offers, achievements, and the kicks you've earned.
... and as always, we’ve been working hard on improving performance and fixing bugs.

Earn kicks when you buy from the comfort of your couch at Walmart.com, eBay, Apple, Hotels.com, Groupon, Booking.com, Jet, Boxed and more through the Shopkick app.  Plus we’ve added new stores in the real world too - Ulta, Torrid, and Watch Station.   And, new gift card options are now available:  Amazon, Uber, eBay, Groupon, iTunes and crocs gift cards join other gift card favorites Starbucks, Target, Walmart, Sephora, Best Buy, TJ Maxx and more.  Earn free gift cards for your everyday shopping!

New updates to the app:
1) New Earn tab
2) Improvements on Discover Tab - Added in a viewed icon to story tiles
3) Updated Product Selector in Receipt Flow
4) iPhone X Support

New updates to the app:
1) New Earn tab
2) Improvements on Discover Tab
3) Updated Product Selector in Receipt Flow
4) iPhone X Support
Improvements and bug fixes
We regularly update and improve Shopkick app to provide our users with the best shopping experience.  Please tell us what you think by providing feedback and review. Thank you for using Shopkick!
Introducing our new image recognition scan. Check it out by scanning Jack links at Walmart or Publix.
Improvements and bug fixes
Improvements and bug fixes
Logging bug fix and improvement
We’re adding more ways to earn Kicks(points) from the comfort of your couch! Check in the app for our latest deals and increase your opportunities to earn your next Free Gift Card!
We’re adding more ways to earn Kicks(points) from the comfort of your couch! Check in the app for our latest deals and increase your opportunities to earn your next Free Gift Card!
We have updated our video player so you can learn about new products and earn kicks more frequently! Fixed bugs, so you can enjoy more opportunities to Shopkick in-store and online!
We have updated our video player so you can learn about new products and earn kicks more frequently! Fixed bugs, so you can enjoy more opportunities to Shopkick in-store and online!
We have updated our app so you can learn about new products and earn kicks more frequently! Fixed bugs, so you can enjoy more opportunities to Shopkick in-store and online!
We have updated our app so you can learn about new products and earn kicks more frequently! Fixed bugs, so you can enjoy more opportunities to Shopkick in-store and online!
With the holidays around the corner, we’ve added ten new online stores like Forever 21, Pier 1 Imports, Gamestop, and more.
We’re working to make sure you get the most out of Black Friday deals, and we’ve added new online partners like Big Lots, Charlotte Russe, Poshmark and more.
We’re making sure you have the best Black Friday Deals, both in-store & online. Check the app to plan out your Black Friday & Cyber Monday shopping.

Turn your kicks into cash now with our new PayPal redemption option. Redeem cash rewards starting from $5. We’re making sure you have the best holiday deals to help you earn free gift cards, both in-store & online. Check out the app for holiday gift guides to help you win this shopping season.

Turn your kicks into cash now with our new PayPal redemption option. Redeem cash rewards starting from $5. We’re making sure you have the best holiday deals to help you earn free gift cards, both in-store & online. Check out the app for holiday gift guides to help you win this shopping season.
Turn your kicks into cash with our new Paypal reward option. Shop from our new online partners Sam’s Club, Warby Parker, Sephora and more.
Start the new year with new performance improvements and bug fixes.
Start the new year with new performance improvements and bug fixes.
Start the new year with new performance improvements and bug fixes.
Improvements to performance and bug fixes, to help you get the most out of Shopkick.

This update includes:
- A fix for a Quick Kick videos bug.
- Various stability improvements.
To help you get the most out of Shopkick we've made improvements to performance, and fixed bugs. No big deal, we've got your back.

This release, check the app to see if you’re in one of our sneak peek groups for two new features:
- A new Search bar, to help you quickly find online and nearby stores that offer kicks.
- A new Notification Center where you can find information about daily special offers, achievements, and the kicks you've earned.
... and as always, we’ve been working hard on improving performance and fixing bugs.

This release, check the app to see if you’re in one of our sneak peek groups for two new features:
- A new Search bar, to help you quickly find online and nearby stores that offer kicks.
- A new Notification Center where you can find information about daily special offers, achievements, and the kicks you've earned.
... and as always, we’ve been working hard on improving performance and fixing bugs.

We're adding some new improvements to make it easier to get the most out of Shopkick.
We're adding four new online stores; Barkbox, Nike, Under Armour, and LOFT.
And you know we're always striving to be our best selves, so we've got lots of behind the scenes improvements and bug fixes.

Our latest updates make it easier than ever to start using Shopkick and collecting free gift cards! With this update, we've added:
- tutorials for new users
- the option to enter an invite code during registration
- an easier way to track how many kicks you've earned

Invite your friends, and share the bonus kicks!

Our latest updates make it easier than ever to start using Shopkick and collecting free gift cards! In this update we've:
- improved tutorials for new users.
- added new ways to earn kicks.
- made it easier to track how many kicks you've earned.

Invite your friends, and share the bonus kicks!
We fixed a bug! Now it'll be easer to scan products that are part of a bundle.

We put our hard hats on and dug down to the pipes below Shopkick to do some maintenance.
We've improved how the app communicates with the Shopkick servers.
And we've improved some of the screens used for bundles, to make them clearer.

We fixed a bug where shopkickers with more than one million kicks were seeing their kicks counts abbreviated to "1M".
Kicks counts will now show all seven figures.
It's a small fix, but it looks great and we want more shopkickers to see it.
So we've also added a new way to earn kicks for submitting receipts, which we'll roll out in the next few weeks.

We fixed a bug where shopkickers with more than one million kicks were seeing their kicks counts abbreviated to "1M".
Kicks counts will now show all seven figures.
It's a small fix, but it looks great and we want more shopkickers to see it.
So we've also added a new way to earn kicks for submitting receipts, which we'll roll out in the next few weeks.

No big changes, just a bit of spring cleaning so that we'll be ready to host the next Blue Weekend, whenever that might be ;)

We have been looking at our old code and asking ourselves, "Does this spark joy?" As a result, we've cleaned up our code, and thrown out some old bits which weren't used anymore. And we're also making sure we're using the latest and greatest APIs to help you get kicks.

Every kick you earn is a little celebration that brings you one step closer to your goals. That's why we are updating the kicks bubble to be a bit more fun. Now when you earn kicks you will see how much progress you've made, and how close you are getting to your next reward.
We have also added Walmart Groceries to our growing list of online stores. One more way we're making it easier to reach your goals.
This release will also improve the app in a hundred little ways, cutting the fat, fixing bugs, etc... You know, the usual.

What's new? Not much, fixing bugs and stuff. What's new with you? Oh wait, I forgot, we just added a reminder feature to the app. 
Have you ever gotten home after shopping and realized that you'd forgoten to open Shopkick to grab all those walk-in and scan kicks? Next time, set a reminder from the settings menu and the app will send a notification to your device when you get to the store. You'll never miss out on those kicks again.

We're getting ready for a new charity drive in the next few weeks where we will be calling on all Shopkickers to help by inviting friends to install Shopkick. That's why for this release we've made the sign up process run smother, look better, and introduce everything Shopkick has to offer more clearly. Check the app for details about the charity drive in the coming weeks.

We're working on some big improvements in the coming weeks, and we're excited to let you see them. 
Until then, we are doing some maintenance to make sure your Shopkick experience is always improving.

- We have added three new online retailers to help you step up your fall fashion and winter wardrobe. New York & Company, Frank And Oak, and Stein Mart. 
- We're adding new ways to kickstart new shopkickers' journeys, so invite your friends, get those invite kicks, and show them how easy it is to get their first gift card reward.
- And we're also setting the groundwork for new things to come.

In this release we've fixed a number of issues, the most notable:
We've improved our support for the newest devices.
We fixed an issue which was preventing some users from getting Walk-ins.
(Don't worry, this wasn't the big update we've been hyping. That's the next release.)

Starting with this release, and going on for the next month, we'll be making big improvements to the app's stability, even when internet connections get spotty. 
This release's big ticket item? We've fixed a bug which was making it hard to get walk-ins. We hate when you can't get walk-ins, maybe as much as you do, so we're glad to have this fixed.
But wait, there's more... as we get closer to the big shopping season we're going to add something big to our list of online stores.

Black Friday is coming, and we're getting ready for it.
We're adding new stores to our online stores list shopDisney, Old Navy, Vitamin Shoppe and more.
We've updated the profile screen in settings. You can use it to tell us what stores you love and what products you are looking for, so we can be sure to we're serving up more of the offers you're interested in.
And we're continuing to improve our app stability, so we can keep the kicks flowing.

This is it, our last release before Black Friday!
We've kept this update simple, a few improvements to make sure the app can handle all the kicks you will be collecting, and all the cards you'll be redeeming. Happy Shopkicking.

Haven't gotten the right gift yet? Well, while you're out looking, getting all those walk-in kicks, why don't you invite some friends to Shopkick?
We're cleaning up the invite screen to make it easier to give the gift of Shopkick to your friends.
If you can add a few friends while you're out shopping, by the time you've found what you're looking for, you'll have earned enough for your next gift card.

We're doing a bit of straightening up after the holidays.
We're adding some improvements to the invites screen, as well as some big changes to the Earn Tab.
Both should help make the app look cleaner, to help you find more kicks, more easily.

For this release we're going to be experimenting with some new visuals to make the app easier to understand. There are updates to the nearby and online stores lists, and to the store pages themselves. These should help you to understand what's available in each store at a glance.  This will be an experiment though, so not all users will see the new screens. 
Even if you aren't in the preview group this release includes bug fixes. One important issue we've addressed was that password reset emails were not working, that has been fixed in this release.

Update: We're releasing this update, 5.6.72, to address a new crash that was preventing users from opening the app.

For this release we're going to be experimenting with some new visuals to make the app easier to understand. There are updates to the nearby and online stores lists, and to the store pages themselves. These should help you to understand what's available in each store at a glance. This will be an experiment though, so not all users will see the new screens.
Even if you aren't in the preview group this release includes bug fixes. One important issue we've addressed was that password reset emails were not working, that has been fixed in this release.

Update: We're releasing another update, 5.6.73, to address the crash that has been preventing users from opening the app. We apologize for the disruption.

For this release we're going to be experimenting with some new visuals to make the app easier to understand. There are updates to the nearby and online stores lists, and to the store pages themselves. These should help you to understand what's available in each store at a glance. This will be an experiment though, so not all users will see the new screens.
Even if you aren't in the preview group this release includes bug fixes. One important issue we've addressed was that password reset emails were not working, that has been fixed in this release.
We're bringing you a small update this week. We're improving the profile screen to make managing your account information easier and clearer. That's about it... What's new with you?

We're bringing you a small update this week. We're improving the profile screen to make managing your account information easier and clearer. The update has made it so that all users were logged out. But that's annoying. So this mini update (5.6.81) will let users remain logged in.

We're bringing you a small update this week. We're improving the profile screen to make managing your account information easier and clearer. 
That update made it so that all users were logged out. But that's annoying. So the mini update, 5.6.81 will let users remain logged in.
We also fixed a bug in the code that detects walk ins. We though it'd be great to get that fix out as soon as we could, so we've got another mini update, 5.6.82.

For those of you stuck at home, Shopkick is adding new online shopping options and offering special elevated kicks for online orders. And we're making keeping track your favorite stores easier than ever. Simply heart the stores you love and we'll make sure they show up at the top of your stores lists whenever kicks are available.

For those of you stuck at home, Shopkick is adding new online shopping options and offering special elevated kicks for online orders. And we're making keeping track your favorite stores easier than ever. Simply heart the stores you love and we'll make sure they show up at the top of your stores lists whenever kicks are available.

We've been busy adding new online stores for you to earn kicks from, and adding new reward options to spend those kicks on. We've made it easer for new users to sign up, and understand how Shopkick works. And, as usual, we're making smaller improvements all over the app.

We have made signing up for a new account easier than ever, including the ability to create a new account using Apple Sign-in. We've continued to add new online options, and more are on their way, so keep checking the online stores tab to find the latest new stores.

We've always been proud of our Shopkick family for their donations to charitable causes. Before now we didn't show those donations on your account under the "My Rewards" section, but in this release we'll start showing your charitable redemptions in there as well. Shopkickers have done a lot of good through their donations, we don't forget that, and we don't want you to either.
We're also adding a new way to share content from the Discover tab with your friends. You can share recipes, great deals, new kick earning opportunities, or cute outfits you find on the Discover tab, each with a simple link that takes anyone who clicks on it into Shopkick and right to the content. (Linking videos is not ready yet, but it's coming soon)

For those shopkickers who have been with us for years we've got a treat, we're showing off your achievements with new profile badges. Under settings you can now find badges for things like, how many kicks have you've earned in total. There are a couple of these badges on the settings screen now, and were going to be adding new ones in the future for things like, charitable giving, and how many scans you've ever done.
This release doesn't have any major features, just a lot of little fixes. We're working on big changes for the coming weeks, but we're always making little improvements whenever we can.

We have so many stores on our online tab now it can be hard to find the store you're looking for, so we're adding a sort and filter button to make it easy. Sort by the biggest kicks, or use a filter to show you only stores from certain categories, like travel or electronics.
We've also continued to improve the sharing features on the Discover tab so you can share that recipe video you found with your friends.

We have so many stores on our online tab now it can be hard to find the store you're looking for, so we're adding a sort and filter button to make it easy. Sort by the biggest kicks, or use a filter to show you only stores from certain categories, like travel or electronics.
We've also continued to improve the sharing features on the Discover tab so you can share that recipe video you found with your friends.

This is a small update which fixes a bug that prevented users from being able to access their accounts on new devices. When a user gets an email with a link to verify their new device, the link should work now.

In this release we're adding more deals to the online store pages. Shopping at online stores is a great way to earn kicks and we're making it easier to find new products and deals at all the online stores.

It's been a log wait but we have got some Big changes coming with this latest release. We are updating the Discover Tab to be a completely new and improved experience. We're also making big improvements to our receipt processing code (boring) so that we can award kicks for receipts faster than ever (awesome). BUT, we're going to be rolling out these improvements carefully over the coming weeks, so bear in mind that most users won't see these changes right away.

In this release we are happy to announce we're adding a new way to earn kicks! We're adding support for eReceipts, receipts sent to your email inbox. Not all stores give out paper receipts, and before now pictures of eReceipts weren't something we could accept. With this new feature not only can we add stores which Shopkickers have been asking for for months now, but they'll be faster and easier than paper receipts. (Don't worry, paper receipts are still welcome) As usual we are going to start small, with a few big name stores, but in the coming weeks and months we'll be adding a whole lot of new stores we couldn't support before.
This is a small update to the last release with some important fixes for the new eReceipt feature. We've fixed three issues which could have prevented users from being able to link emails.

This is another small update to the last release with some important fixes for the new eReceipt feature. We've fixed two issues which could have delayed or blocked redemptions with eReceipts, and one issue which muted all video sound.

This release includes a lot of small improvements to make the app more stable and dependable. We're getting ready for the holiday season (Already?!) by making sure that Shopkick is going to be ready to help you earn kicks and redeem kicks throughout the next few months.

This in another of our small stability improvement updates. This time we've fixed a bug which could cause the app to crash if your phone lost it's internet connection while you were watching a video. We've also fixed a few minor text issues.

For the last big update of the year we're getting ready to be there for you while you shop this holiday season, and this year we've added more online shopping options than we've ever had. We're also making it easier for your friends to sign up, so share some holiday spirit, and your invite codes.

For the last big update of the year we're getting ready to be there for you while you shop this holiday season, and this year we've added more online shopping options than we've ever had. We're also making it easier for your friends to sign up, so share some holiday spirit, and your invite codes. Update: we also added a fix for videos showing up tiny or not playing.

For the last big update of the year we're getting ready to be there for you while you shop this holiday season, and this year we've added more online shopping options than we've ever had. We're also making it easier for your friends to sign up, so share some holiday spirit, and your invite codes. 
Update 1: We added a fix for videos showing up tiny or not playing.
Update 2: We fixed a rare crash which could occur on the invite screen.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
